user_query: I had a written contract in CA; last payment was 18 months ago—am I still within the deadline to sue?
In California, my client hasn’t paid a $8,500 invoice for a written contract. Work delivered May 12, 2024. Can I sue and what should I include?
I’m in California. We had an oral agreement for $2,000 in services finished July 2024 and the client ghosted. Do I still have time to file and what are my arguments?
California commercial lease: landlord didn’t return our $3,000 security deposit after we vacated in June 2024. What law applies and how do we recover?
I had a written contract in California but the other party stopped paying. What law applies for breach of contract?
A supplier in California failed to deliver goods we agreed on. Can I recover damages for non-performance?
